text.headline: A summary of my professional journey
text.text: Below you fill find a timeline of my academic and professional achievements!

text.headline: Entigrum Technical writer
text.text: Wrote an article about flexible learning pathways representing King Khalid University.

text.headline: Saudi Competitive Programming Constant
text.text: Ranked among the top 20 programmers by the Ministry of Communications and Information Technology

text.headline: Introduction to Machine Learning, Deep Learning & Python.
text.text: Achieved certification in an introductory course by the Ministry of Communications and Information Technology

text.headline: KAUST Artificial Intelligence week
text.text: Successfully completed and earned certification in an introductory course on the mathematical bases of data science

text.headline: Introduction to HTML5 and CSS3 course
text.text: Attended an intensive course on web development by University of Michigan

text.headline: KAUST advanced Artificial Intelligence week
text.text: Awarded a certificate upon completing on computer visison and NLP

text.headline: Representative of the Computer Science department for ABET Reaccreditation of Academic Programs.
text.text: Was chosen to represent the computer science department for ABET reaccreditation

text.headline: Innovation Hackathon for Digital Transformation in Healthcare and Medical Education.
text.text: Participated with MONTHER: a psychologist NLP

text.headline: Baker Hughes Engineering intern
text.text: worked on developing and optimizing machine learning models using various data analysis techniques that significantly enhanced decision-making processes.

text.headline: Quantum Analyzer
text.text: Developed a machine learning tool for DNA sequence analysis showcasing proficiency in quantum computing and bioinformatics.

text.headline: Graduation!
text.text: Graduated with a first honors degree in computer science in the track 'Intelligent systems'

text.headline: SRACO Communication Design Engineer
text.text: Participated in the development of a service-oriented website and integrated AI technologies to enhance operational efficiency in the office environment.

text.headline: Quantum Analyzer Research
text.text: Currently writing a paper on ways of deploying quantum machine learning algorithms on traditional computers
